greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Total number of holes in decimal expansion of the number n, assuming 4 has 1 hole.
link: Indranil Ghosh, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..50000
example: We assume decimal digits 1,2,3,5,7 have no hole; 0,4,6,9 have one hole each; 8 has two holes. So a(148)=3.
results.author: _Matthew Conroy_, Oct 11 2001
